subject: Question about Trimmer
author: Luis
full_text: I have an important question , i  buyed a old radio . I want remove the variable capacitor (tunner) to replace by a varactor  , but , How can i do to know the trimmer`s value ? ... and i dont know , because it appears like two caps in one . ( Is a square trimmer , whith tree pins in  one side , and 3 in other side ) . I need to know about the trimmers value to replace it by the apropiate varactor ? .... The radio have 3 bads . Fm , am , and sw . I heard there are one variable capacitor to each band , i am confused .
